page.title: 06SHEFFORD BLACKSMITH
page.content: Our blacksmith is called Mr Bird. His forge is situated in the yard behind the Post Office.It has been there for a long time.Mr Bird's father and grandfather both worked there.The forge is not very far from the crossroads so perhaps it used to get a lot of work from travellers.Now Mr Bird spends most of his time shoeing horses and people come to him from all the villages around Shefford. He showed us the old bellows for his fire but now he uses an electric fan.He also showed us the special place in his yard where cartwheels were put so that an iron tyre could be fitted to them.
